framework
Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  framework.Grid

public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object

The class contains the definition of the grid that will be used to model the world in the game. It specifies a bunch of methods to manipulate the grid.

Author:
Gautham Nagaraju, Victor Dong, Prakhar Dubey, Akash Kulkarni

setCell

public void setCell(int x,
                    int y,

Sets the state of the specified cell to the specified value.

Parameters:
x - the row in which the cell occurs
y - the col in which the cell occurs
state - the state to update the cell to.
